The ten reasons for laying down training: For the well-being of the Saṅgha
For the comfort of the Saṅgha
For keeping difficult persons in check
For the comfort of good-hearted mendicants
For restraining defilements that affect the present life
For protecting against defilements that affect lives to come
For inspiring confidence in those without it
For increasing confidence in those who have it
For the continuation of the true teaching
For the support of the training.
